synopsis.text: Although Yuuri, the privileged son of a wealthy estate owner, is initially wary of his new maid, Lilith, he finds himself captivated by her enigmatic allure. With her striking beauty, exceptional culinary skills, and an uncanny ability to anticipate his every need, Lilith seems almost too perfect to be true. As Yuuri becomes increasingly suspicious of her mysterious aura and bewitching purple eyes, a unique bond begins to form between them. Despite his growing paranoia, Yuuri can't help but be drawn in by Lilith's kindness and playful teasing. As they spend more time together, the once lonely boy finds himself developing a special connection with his mysterious maid, leading them both on a journey of discovery and companionship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
